<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Collect the inline chain, stopping if we find a location that has already</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> &#42;UpdatedLoc = CachedResult;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!UpdatedLoc) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If no cache hits, then back() is the end of the inline chain, that is,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the DILocation whose scope ends in the Subprogram to be replaced.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Cache&#91;LocToUpdate&#93; = UpdatedLoc;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recreate the location chain, bottom-up, starting at the new scope (or a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cached result).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> &#42;LocToUpdate : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(LocChain)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UpdatedLoc =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#a7d10a7b9b7f40b04d27ed97c38ea1950">DILocation::get</a>(Ctx, LocToUpdate-&gt;getLine(), LocToUpdate-&gt;getColumn(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        LocToUpdate-&gt;getScope(), UpdatedLoc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Cache&#91;LocToUpdate&#93; = UpdatedLoc;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UpdatedLoc;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc/#a55acf718f2931a7050c4ed39eb0434e7"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc/#a37616eb7c1e47f6df05f3fdbdc09552a">DebugLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc/#a55acf718f2931a7050c4ed39eb0434e7">DebugLoc::appendInlinedAt</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc/#a37616eb7c1e47f6df05f3fdbdc09552a">DebugLoc</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> &#42;InlinedAt,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Ctx,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;const MDNode &#42;, MDNode &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;Cache) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;DILocation &#42;, 3&gt;</a> InlinedAtLocations;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a> = InlinedAt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> &#42;CurInlinedAt = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Gather all the inlined-at nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> &#42;IA = CurInlinedAt-&gt;getInlinedAt()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip any we&#39;ve already built nodes for.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Found = Cache&#91;IA&#93;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;DILocation&gt;</a>(Found);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurInlinedAt = IA;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Starting from the top, rebuild the nodes to point to the new inlined-at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// location (then rebuilding the rest of the chain behind it) and update the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// map of already-constructed inlined-at nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> &#42;MD : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(InlinedAtLocations))</span></CodeLine>
